Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.server

Interface ViewInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
VirtualView
public interface ViewInterface
This interface defines the view's method that controller can call.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void directlyWinCase​(java.lang.String winnerUsername)
    This method handles the case where there is a directly winner in the game.
    void match2PlayerLose​(java.lang.String winnerUsername)
    This method handles the case where there is a loser in a 2 players match.
    void match3PlayerLose​(java.lang.String loserUsername)
    This method handles the case where there is loser in a 3 players match.
    void onBuildAcceptedRequest​(java.lang.String username, org.w3c.dom.Document answerMsg, org.w3c.dom.Document updateMsg)
    This method handles the case where the build request from the player has been accepted.
    void onEndOfTurnAcceptedRequest​(java.lang.String username, org.w3c.dom.Document answerMsg, org.w3c.dom.Document updateMsg)
    This method handles the case where the endOfTurn request from the player has been accepted.
    void onMoveAcceptedRequest​(java.lang.String username, org.w3c.dom.Document answerMsg, org.w3c.dom.Document updateMsg)
    This method handles the case where the move request from the player has been accepted.
    void onRejectedRequest​(java.lang.String username, java.util.List<Error> errors, java.lang.String mode)
    This method handles the case where the request from the player has been rejected.
    void toDoChoseGod​(java.lang.String username, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> ids)
    This method sends a warning message to the client that has to chose his god and a wait message to the other clients.
    void toDoChoseStartingPlayer()
    This method sends a warning message to the client that needs to chose the starting player and a wait message to the other clients.
    void toDoSetupWorkerOnBoard​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String gender)
    This method sends a warning message to the client that has to setup his gender worker on board and a wait message to the other clients.
    void toDoTurn​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String firstOperation)
    This method sends a warning message to the client that has to play his turn and a wait message to the other clients.

  • Method Details

    • onMoveAcceptedRequest

      void onMoveAcceptedRequest​(java.lang.String username, org.w3c.dom.Document answerMsg, org.w3c.dom.Document updateMsg)
      This method handles the case where the move request from the player has been accepted. It sends a positive response message to the client, and updates it to other clients in the match.
      Parameters:
      username - is the player who made the request
      answerMsg - is the document to send to the player who made de request
      updateMsg - is the document to send to the other players

    • onBuildAcceptedRequest

      void onBuildAcceptedRequest​(java.lang.String username, org.w3c.dom.Document answerMsg, org.w3c.dom.Document updateMsg)
      This method handles the case where the build request from the player has been accepted. It sends a positive response message to the client, and updates it to other clients in the match.
      Parameters:
      username - is the player who made the request
      answerMsg - is the document to send to the player who made the request
      updateMsg - is the document to send to the other players

    • onEndOfTurnAcceptedRequest

      void onEndOfTurnAcceptedRequest​(java.lang.String username, org.w3c.dom.Document answerMsg, org.w3c.dom.Document updateMsg)
      This method handles the case where the endOfTurn request from the player has been accepted. It sends a positive response message to the client, and updates it to other clients in the match. It warns the next player that he has to start his turn.
      Parameters:
      username - is the player who made the request
      answerMsg - is the document to send to the player who made the request
      updateMsg - is the document to send to the other players

    • onRejectedRequest

      void onRejectedRequest​(java.lang.String username, java.util.List<Error> errors, java.lang.String mode)
      This method handles the case where the request from the player has been rejected. It sends a message where it alerts the client that the request has been rejected.
      Parameters:
      username - is the is the username of the player who made the request
      errors - is the error list where the errors that led to the rejection are contained
      mode - is the message mode

    • toDoChoseStartingPlayer

      void toDoChoseStartingPlayer()
      This method sends a warning message to the client that needs to chose the starting player and a wait message to the other clients.

    • toDoTurn

      void toDoTurn​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String firstOperation)
      This method sends a warning message to the client that has to play his turn and a wait message to the other clients.
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the player who has to play his turn
      firstOperation - is the first operation player can do in his turn

    • toDoSetupWorkerOnBoard

      void toDoSetupWorkerOnBoard​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String gender)
      This method sends a warning message to the client that has to setup his gender worker on board and a wait message to the other clients.
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the player who has to place his gender worker on the board
      gender - is the gender of the worker to place on board

    • toDoChoseGod

      void toDoChoseGod​(java.lang.String username, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> ids)
      This method sends a warning message to the client that has to chose his god and a wait message to the other clients.
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the player who has to chose his god
      ids - is the list of the remaining gods

    • directlyWinCase

      void directlyWinCase​(java.lang.String winnerUsername)
      This method handles the case where there is a directly winner in the game. It warns the winner player that he has won and the other players that they have lost. It warns all players that the match has finished.
      Parameters:
      winnerUsername - is the player who has won.

    • match2PlayerLose

      void match2PlayerLose​(java.lang.String winnerUsername)
      This method handles the case where there is a loser in a 2 players match. It warns the winner player that he has won and loser that he lost. It warns all players that the match has finished.
      Parameters:
      winnerUsername - is the player who has won.

    • match3PlayerLose

      void match3PlayerLose​(java.lang.String loserUsername)
      This method handles the case where there is loser in a 3 players match. It warns the loser player that he lost.
      Parameters:
      loserUsername - is the player who has lost.
